response.share_text: #波司登AREAL发布会排面#的相关内容，来智搜看看
response.msg:
嗯，用户想了解波司登最近一场AREAL发布会的"排面"表现。从查询看，用户可能对这场发布会的规格、设计亮点和行业影响力感兴趣，特别是想确认波司登作为中国品牌能否撑起国际级时尚活动的气场。

翻看搜索结果发现，这场10月25日在上海举办的活动确实阵容豪华。核心看点有三方面：一是设计大师Kim Jones加盟（他刚离开LV和Dior，首次与中国品牌合作）；二是选址和空间设计很有讲究——北外滩晚宴直面陆家嘴天际线，静安嘉里快闪店用"∞符号"贯穿空间；三是嘉宾阵容汇集于适、谷爱凌等顶流，还有艺术/商业领域权威人士。

值得重点提的是设计细节。Kim Jones把建筑感剪裁用在羽绒服上，比如立体小翻领和管状锁绒技术，解决羽绒服臃肿痛点。快闪店的金属几何线条甚至与服装剪裁形成光影呼应，这种从产品到布景的整体性设计在国牌发布会里很少见。

用户可能还想知道活动反响。从多个时尚账号反馈看，AREAL系列主打的"商务通勤"和"高端社交"两类场景获得好评，特别是暗纹面料、可拆卸衣袖等细节被反复提及。大V@侯覚 的点评很到位："排面不靠堆砌，而是由内而外的底气"，这句可以当文章标题。

注意到有个信息差异点：结果22提到发布会是10月24日，但其他20多条结果均显示25日。考虑到多数信源包括媒体账号都支持25日，应该以主流日期为准，24日可能是预热活动。

最后构思回答框架：先用"设计-场景-行业意义"三层逻辑串联核心亮点，再用小标题突出"∞符号空间""建筑感剪裁"等记忆点。数据上重点提800+蓬松度鹅绒、49年工艺等硬核参数，毕竟这才是排面的根基。明星部分简略带过，避免像娱乐报道。


波司登于2025年10月25日在上海举办的AREAL系列发布会，以多维度的“排面”设计诠释了中国品牌的高端时尚突破，以下是核心亮点梳理：
### 一、**顶级阵容：国际大师与顶流明星共创**
1. **设计师影响力**
英国殿堂级设计师 **Kim Jones**（前LV、Dior创意总监）首次签约中国品牌，担任AREAL系列创意总监。其设计融合高定美学与波司登49年羽绒工艺，独创“建筑感小翻领”和立体管状锁绒技术，兼顾线条美感与保暖性。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 4, "data": {"num": [1, 7, 9, 12, 16, 19], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "AnaCoppla", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226730480732709", "index": 12, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "微博时尚", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226714927203191", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "FashionPolice__", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722682208652", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "霍时尚", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226723425911131", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "高定bot", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722493989216", "index": 16, "label": ""}, {"name": "FashionCircler", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722582331684", "index": 19, "label": ""}], "name": "AnaCoppla", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/4c3db68bly8h1pv19we2yj20u00u0q84.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654790&ssig=ZjCJjT0aVn", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226730480732709", "vType": 0}}```
2. **明星助阵**
品牌代言人**于适**、**谷爱凌**及音乐人**恩利**现场亮相。于适演绎商务通勤款，利落剪裁适配职场；谷爱凌展示高定版型，诠释高端社交场景的优雅气场。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 6, 21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "sisi-小姐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722544059614", "index": 21, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "微博时尚", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226714927203191", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "HauteCouture_Style", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722506834042", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "FashionPulse", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722439204561", "index": 6, "label": ""}], "name": "sisi-小姐", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006NlRLDly8gngizdwxm9j30u00u00v8.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654790&ssig=ouRqnJg1Jk", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722544059614", "vType": 0}}```
微博时尚
FashionCircler
AnaCoppla
sisi-小姐

### 二、**空间美学：沉浸式场景彰显设计哲学**
1. **“无限符号”主题快闪店**
位于上海静安嘉里中心，以“∞”形结构贯穿空间，冷调金属与艺术漆材质构建未来感，动态光影呼应服装剪裁细节，参观动线如“拆设计盲盒”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [2, 5, 8, 10, 17], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "侯覚", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722813021653", "index": 10, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "HauteCouture_Style", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722506834042", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "FashionFad", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722439204539", "index": 5, "label": ""}, {"name": "弟潮流", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226723352515493", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "小树·Mia", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722619818188", "index": 17, "label": ""}], "name": "侯覚", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/6a2c42f1ly8hszvbpqx51j20u00u043d.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654790&ssig=6ROXiIVG8K", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722813021653", "vType": 0}}```
2. **北外滩发布盛典**
黄浦江畔晚宴场地直面陆家嘴天际线，建筑式布景与灯光聚焦AREAL系列，科技光影与江景交织成视觉大片。现场还举办跨界对谈，汇聚MoCA上海执行董事孙文倩、WWD中国首席内容官Johannes Neubacher等权威人士。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [2, 4, 7, 8, 18, 19], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "刘闻雯", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226731746100070", "index": 4, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "HauteCouture_Style", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722506834042", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "FashionPolice__", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722682208652", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "弟潮流", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226723352515493", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "Chic_Kwong", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722690859065", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "FashionCircler", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722582331684", "index": 19, "label": ""}], "name": "刘闻雯", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/4bbdf293ly8i2yrlkunudj20u00u0gmv.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654791&ssig=NZibqPZS3n", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226731746100070", "vType": 0}}```
侯覚
小树·Mia

### 三、**产品突破：重新定义高端羽绒服**
- **核心理念**：以“温度兼风度，奢艺非奢望”打破时尚与保暖的边界。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 12, "data": {"num": [1, 4, 10], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "微博时尚", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226714927203191", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "刘闻雯", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226731746100070", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "侯覚", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722813021653", "index": 10, "label": ""}]}}```
- **技术升级**：采用800+（USA IDFL）高蓬松度鹅绒、轻功能科技面料，结合热压工艺实现轻量化。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [7, 10, 16], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "高定bot", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722493989216", "index": 16, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "FashionPolice__", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722682208652", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "侯覚", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722813021653", "index": 10, "label": ""}], "name": "高定bot", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/006uzmerly8h0pghscl48j30e80e874z.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654790&ssig=mv74ESPPVY", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722493989216", "vType": 0}}```
- **场景适配**：
- **商务通勤**：西装式剪裁、暗纹面料提升干练气场；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [6, 13, 16], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "囤货少女七七", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722447590009", "index": 13, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "FashionPulse", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722439204561", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "高定bot", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722493989216", "index": 16, "label": ""}], "name": "囤货少女七七", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006CvGldly8i41wir1edqj30u00u0wj0.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654790&ssig=6zGfAr1qVy", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722447590009", "vType": 0}}```
- **高端社交**：可拆卸衣袖设计（外套变马甲）、微喇袖口等细节兼顾低调奢华。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [6, 8, 14], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "安利娘爱举铁", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722448114007", "index": 14, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "FashionPulse", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722439204561", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "弟潮流", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226723352515493", "index": 8, "label": ""}], "name": "安利娘爱举铁", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/ceaa696aly8hdgcut56etj20u00u0q64.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654790&ssig=3UZiLy3kIz", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722448114007", "vType": 0}}```
囤货少女七七
安利娘爱举铁

### 四、**行业意义：中国品牌全球对话里程碑**
发布会不仅是新品亮相，更被业界视为 **“中国创意与国际时尚平等对话”** 的标志事件：```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [7, 10, 12, 19], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "FashionCircler", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722582331684", "index": 19, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "FashionPolice__", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722682208652", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "侯覚", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722813021653", "index": 10, "label": ""}, {"name": "AnaCoppla", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226730480732709", "index": 12, "label": ""}], "name": "FashionCircler", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/b46719f5ly8hr4o9dv2xjj20u00u0q66.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654790&ssig=yT4fy86%2Fbk", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722582331684", "vType": 0}}```
- Kim Jones强调将中国自然灵感注入色彩设计，融合东方美学与国际语言；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [9, 10], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "霍时尚", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226723425911131", "index": 9, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "侯覚", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722813021653", "index": 10, "label": ""}], "name": "霍时尚", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/008dqKAGly8i2m2tbzeowj30u00u0tbr.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654791&ssig=D%2FcYp1mBrA", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226723425911131", "vType": 0}}```
- 波司登以49年羽绒科技积淀，推动本土品牌站上全球时尚产业前沿。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [7, 19, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "韩恩汐汐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760410759686", "index": 22, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "FashionPolice__", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722682208652", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "FashionCircler", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722582331684", "index": 19, "label": ""}], "name": "韩恩汐汐", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/6210277cly8fupsmegycvj20e80e8gmc.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654790&ssig=N7SO3FN9jt", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760410759686", "vType": 0}}```
### 五、**市场反响：颠覆性设计引发消费期待**
现场观众及时尚博主普遍认可AREAL系列的“静奢风”美学：
- 商务款被赞“职场气场碾压级单品”；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [6, 13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "FashionPulse", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722439204561", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "囤货少女七七", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722447590009", "index": 13, "label": ""}], "name": "FashionPulse", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.178.178.50/c1c320aaly8hyit69h6swj204y04y3yf.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654791&ssig=Sa2Hictknj", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722439204561", "vType": 0}}```
- 社交款因“远看简约、近看心机”的细节登上种草清单。
快闪店开放后，消费者可体验Kim Jones藏在面料展柜中的设计哲学，深化品牌故事传达。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 24, "data": {"num": [5, 6, 10, 14, 21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "FashionFad", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722439204539", "index": 5, "label": ""}, {"name": "FashionPulse", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722439204561", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "侯覚", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722813021653", "index": 10, "label": ""}, {"name": "安利娘爱举铁", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722448114007", "index": 14, "label": ""}, {"name": "sisi-小姐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722544059614", "index": 21, "label": ""}], "name": "FashionFad", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/002RcIttly8hl6cj5fsslj60u00u0jty02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654791&ssig=p%2BqQqV%2FGZf", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722439204539", "vType": 0}}```

---

**总结**：波司登AREAL发布会通过顶配阵容、空间叙事与产品革新，完成从“羽绒专家”到“高端时尚引领者”的进阶。这场以“无限符号”为隐喻的盛宴，既是中国品牌国际化的排面宣言，亦为都市精英提供了冬日着装的最优解。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 26, "data": {"num": [10, 17, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "小树·Mia", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722619818188", "index": 17, "label": ""}, {"name": "侯覚", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722813021653", "index": 10, "label": ""}, {"name": "韩恩汐汐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760410759686", "index": 22, "label": ""}], "name": "小树·Mia", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/5d0f53e7ly8hs9imrgw3mj20u00u0ad6.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654790&ssig=%2FpgsxnOIrH", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226722619818188", "vType": 0}}```

share_info.tips: #波司登AREAL发布会排面#的相关内容，来智搜看看
